title: "Elon Musk says Tesla Cybertruck may soon be able to function as a boat"
text: "Tesla's Cybertruck may soon be able to function dually as an electric pickup and boat
source_name: Elon Musk revealed on X on Monday."

title: "Apple Needs to Sell its Vision"
text: "The halting of Apple Watch sales adds another growth challenge as the tech company also misses out on the artificial-intelligence rally."

title: "Apple is worth $3 trillion. It also has a few obvious problems."
text: "Apple is heading into 2024 as the world's most valuable company again. The company's share price is high
source_name: but hardware sales and China are areas of weakness."
